attributes.action: Stop the Army getting all the glory of war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the Army getting all the glory of war when they would never get there without ships from the navy or planes from the air force. And in the zulu wars it was the navy that got the field guns to Rorkes Drift not the army and it was the Navy, Royal Marines and Gurkas that won the Falklands But yet the army get all the Fame and Glory
